main event: On January 10, 1954, a witness observed a ball-shaped object during a 3-5 minute sighting, described as having a straight flight before exploding.
interesting points: The object was seen moving across a red fire for about 30 seconds before it exploded., The visibility was reported as poor due to haze and mist during the sighting., The witness described the object as round and bigger than a basketball., The sighting was part of the Project Blue Book investigation into unidentified flying objects., Investigations suggested it might have been navigational lights from routine air traffic.
witness description: The witness is a housewife, and reliability cannot be judged.
